title: Econometric Analysis
description: Econometric techniques and applications in economic and business analysis.  Practical issues involving modeling, estimation, hypothesis testing, and emphasizing computer implementation through econometric software.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECON 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or COE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MGT 2250 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of B
